mapper.select: SELECT m.fid fid,r.fid rid, wm.fid wid, r.ftype_id ftype_id, fequipment_no,fviceman,r.fmoney, fstart_time,fend_time,fdesc FROM tb_welding_maintenance m inner join tb_maintenance_record r on fmaintenance_id = r.fid inner join tb_welding_machine wm on m.fwelding_id = wm.fid where m.fid = #{wid}
SELECT finsframework_id FROM tb_welding_machine WHERE fid=#{mid}
SELECT fid,fmaintenance_id rid FROM tb_welding_maintenance WHERE fwelding_id = #{wid}
SELECT * FROM tb_maintenance_record r inner join tb_welding_maintenance m on m.fmaintenance_id = r.fid where m.fwelding_id=#{wid} and fend_time is null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_maintenance_record(ftype_id, fviceman, fmoney, fdesc, fstart_time, fend_time, fcreator, fcreatetime) VALUES (#{typeId},#{viceman},#{money},#{desc},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{creator},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_maintenance_record SET fend_time = now() WHERE fid = #{wid}
